name: The Gnawing Hunger
description:
"The Gnawing Hunger"

Victor doesn't know what happened to the science vessel Cormorant, but he's about to find out.

Design, Art, Writing, Code, and Menu Music by Alexander Kazazis

WASD/Arrow Keys to Move

E to Interact

P to view Progress

M to view Map

https://fallingwallgames.itch.io

All Other Music by Tony Longworth

https://tonylongworth.com/

Color Palette: Lacking64 by Archimare

https://lospec.com/palette-list/lacking64

Created in 5 weeks for Themed Horror Jam #6

https://itch.io/jam/themed-horror-game-jam-6

Theme: Among the Stars

Optional Challenges: In Space; Aliens; Constellation Puzzle

Content warning: This is a horror game and as such contains a number of disturbing themes, including body horror and death.
